languages.text: притесненный, конечно же, украл часть талонов, но ему семью кормить нужно, а энфорсеры обдирают работяг до нитки.

"Ваша Светлость, я работаю без перерыва на отдых, но в итоге получаю всего семь пайковых талонов на пятнадцать голодных ртов! Каждую вахту блюстители обирают меня, как и всех, кому удается честным трудом..."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I work hard, never even take breaks to rest, and all I earn is seven ration cards with fifteen mouths to feed back home! The enforcers shake me down every shift, just like they do every other honest hard worker who—"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, я работаю без перерыва на отдых, но в итоге получаю всего семь пайковых талонов на пятнадцать голодных ртов! Каждую вахту блюстители обирают меня, как и всех, кому удается честным трудом..."

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I work without ever taking a break to rest here, and all I earn is seven ration cards when I have fifteen mouths to feed! Every shift, the enforcers shake me down just like they do every other honest hard worker who—"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I work without ever taking a break to rest here, and all I earn is seven ration cards when I have fifteen mouths to feed! Every shift, the enforcers shake me down just like they do every other honest hard worker who—"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I work hard, never even take breaks to rest, and all I earn is seven ration cards with fifteen mouths to feed back home! The enforcers shake me down every shift, just like they do every other honest hard worker who—"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I work hard, never even take breaks to rest, and all I earn is seven ration cards with fifteen mouths to feed back home! The enforcers shake me down every shift, just like they do every other honest hard worker who—"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I work hard, never even take breaks to rest, and all I earn is seven ration cards with fifteen mouths to feed back home! The enforcers shake me down every shift, just like they do every other honest hard worker who—"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I work hard, never even take breaks to rest, and all I earn is seven ration cards with fifteen mouths to feed back home! The enforcers shake me down every shift, just like they do every other honest hard worker who—"

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, trabajo duro, nunca me paro ni a descansar, ¡y solo consigo siete tarjetas de racionamiento con quince bocas que alimentar en casa! Los guardias me roban después de cada turno, igual que hacen con todos los demás trabajadores honrados que...».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I work hard, never even take breaks to rest, and all I earn is seven ration cards with fifteen mouths to feed back home! The enforcers shake me down every shift, just like they do every other honest hard worker who—"

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, trabajo duro, nunca me paro ni a descansar, ¡y solo consigo siete tarjetas de racionamiento con quince bocas que alimentar en casa! Los guardias me roban después de cada turno, igual que hacen con todos los demás trabajadores honrados que...».

languages.text: 「閣下、俺は一生懸命、休息も取らずの働いて、それで稼げる配給カードはたった７枚だ。家には食わせなきゃならないのが15人もいるのに！エンフォーサーはシフトごとに俺をゆするんだ。他の誠実な労働者にもしているように…」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I work hard, never even take breaks to rest, and all I earn is seven ration cards with fifteen mouths to feed back home! The enforcers shake me down every shift, just like they do every other honest hard worker who—"

traits.locale_text: 「閣下、俺は一生懸命、休息も取らずの働いて、それで稼げる配給カードはたった７枚だ。家には食わせなきゃならないのが15人もいるのに！エンフォーサーはシフトごとに俺をゆするんだ。他の誠実な労働者にもしているように…」

languages.text: “大人，我不辞劳苦地工作，从来没休息过。我只能拿到七张配给卡，可我家里却有十五张嘴巴要喂！那些执法者每次轮班都会勒索我，就像勒索其他那些诚实、勤劳的工人——”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I work hard, never even take breaks to rest, and all I earn is seven ration cards with fifteen mouths to feed back home! The enforcers shake me down every shift, just like they do every other honest hard worker who—"

traits.locale_text: “大人，我不辞劳苦地工作，从来没休息过。我只能拿到七张配给卡，可我家里却有十五张嘴巴要喂！那些执法者每次轮班都会勒索我，就像勒索其他那些诚实、勤劳的工人——”

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich arbeite hart, mache niemals Ruhepausen und verdiene damit nur sieben Essensmarken, obwohl ich zu Hause fünfzehn Mäuler versorgen muss! Die Enforcers nehmen mir in jeder Schicht etwas weg, genau wie allen anderen ehrlichen Arbeitern, die ..."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I work hard, never even take breaks to rest, and all I earn is seven ration cards with fifteen mouths to feed back home! The enforcers shake me down every shift, just like they do every other honest hard worker who—"

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich arbeite hart, mache niemals Ruhepausen und verdiene damit nur sieben Essensmarken, obwohl ich zu Hause fünfzehn Mäuler versorgen muss! Die Enforcers nehmen mir in jeder Schicht etwas weg, genau wie allen anderen ehrlichen Arbeitern, die ..."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, je travaille dur sans jamais faire de pause, et tout ça pour quoi ? Sept pauvres tickets de rationnement ! Alors que j'ai quinze bouches à nourrir ! À chaque quart que je prends, les prévôts viennent me détrousser, comme ils font avec tous les autres ouvriers qui... »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I work hard, never even take breaks to rest, and all I earn is seven ration cards with fifteen mouths to feed back home! The enforcers shake me down every shift, just like they do every other honest hard worker who—"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, je travaille dur sans jamais faire de pause, et tout ça pour quoi ? Sept pauvres tickets de rationnement ! Alors que j'ai quinze bouches à nourrir ! À chaque quart que je prends, les prévôts viennent me détrousser, comme ils font avec tous les autres ouvriers qui... »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, ben çok çalışırım. Dinlenmek için neredeyse mola bile vermem ama kazandıklarım, yedi kumanya kartından ibaret. Evde elime bakan on beş kişi var! İnfazcılar, her vardiyada benden haraç alıyorlar. Tıpkı namusuyla kazanan tüm işçilere yaptıkları..."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I work hard, never even take breaks to rest, and all I earn is seven ration cards with fifteen mouths to feed back home! The enforcers shake me down every shift, just like they do every other honest hard worker who—"
